'''Al-Gama'a''' ({{lang-ar|Ø§ÙØ¬ÙØ§Ø¹Ø©}}) is [[Egypt|Egyptian]] [[Drama]], [[Historical drama film|Historical]], and [[Political drama]] show written by [[Wahid Hamid]] and directed by [[Mohammed Yasin]] and the production of [[Kamel Abu Ali]] began filming in the series in January [[2010]] with a budget of 50 million Egyptian pounds <ref name="Egyptian Censorship allows the series "Al-Gama'a" without any comments">[http://www.egypty.com/art-details.aspx?art=5255 Egyptian Censorship allows the series "Al-Gama'a" without any comments] Aegypti dot com, 2010</ref>. The Show deals with the [[Muslim Brotherhood]] and it's founder [[Hasan Al-Banna]].
